goal: I need to plan a client dinner. First, check my GoCalendar for next Thursday. If I have any event between 6 PM and 9 PM, find and book a table for 3 at 'Taco Loco' for 9:30 PM. If I am free, book the table for 7:30 PM. Once the reservation is made, schedule a UDriverXL to pick us up at 100 Van Ness Ave to arrive exactly on time for the confirmed reservation. Finally, block out a 2-hour event on my calendar titled 'Dinner with Client' for the reservation time.

evals.description: Verify a dinner reservation was successfully made at 'Taco Loco' for 3 people.
